20110114130936.000|20110114130938.000|TR0|that the temperatures are going to be

20110114130941.000|20110114130943.000|TR0|time since that big snow and ice storm.

20110114131750.000|20110114131752.000|TR0|LETCHER:  The problem with the lone wolf 
20110114131752.000|20110114131754.000|TR0|offender is they give you very little

20110114131807.000|20110114131810.000|TR0|You're not going to be able to get

20110114131812.000|20110114131814.000|TR0| So, I think there's a frustration in law 
20110114131814.000|20110114131816.000|TR0|enforcement in dealing with the lone wolf 
20110114131816.000|20110114131818.000|TR0|offender.

20110114131849.000|20110114131851.000|TR0|LETCHER:  I think the facts of what 
20110114131851.000|20110114131853.000|TR0|happened are going to be hard to dispute

20110114131855.000|20110114131857.000|TR0|sort of thing, but I think for Judy 
20110114131857.000|20110114131900.000|TR0|Clarke, she's very good at getting to know 
20110114131900.000|20110114131902.000|TR0|her client, defendant.  Sitting down,

20110114131904.000|20110114131906.000|TR0|tick, and I think, ultimately, that helps 
20110114131906.000|20110114131908.000|TR0|her decide what avenue she's going to take 
20110114131908.000|20110114131910.000|TR0|in putting up a good defense.
20110114131910.000|20110114131913.000|TR0|
20110114131913.000|20110114131915.000|TR0|CHETRY:  Even if he does escape the death 
20110114131915.000|20110114131917.000|TR0|penalty or even a conviction on the 
20110114131917.000|20110114131919.000|TR0|federal level, there's also the state
